Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.group12.flus.utils

Class DateTimeUtil

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.group12.flus.utils.DateTimeUtil
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DateTimeUtil extends Object implements Serializable
The class represents a utility class for date and time.
Author:
Stian Lyng

  • Constructor Details

    • DateTimeUtil

      public DateTimeUtil()
      Creates a new instance of DateTimeUtil with the current date and time.

    • DateTimeUtil

      public DateTimeUtil(LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Creates a new instance of DateTimeUtil with the specified date and time.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - the date and time.

    • DateTimeUtil

      public DateTimeUtil(int year, int month, int dayOfMonth, int hour, int minute, int second) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new instance of DateTimeUtil with the specified date and time.
      Parameters:
      year - the year.
      month - the month.
      dayOfMonth - the day.
      hour - the hour.
      minute - the minute.
      second - the second.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the year is less than 0 or greater than the current year.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the month is less than 1 or greater than 12.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the day is less than 1 or greater than 31.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the hour is less than 0 or greater than 23.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the minute is less than 0 or greater than 59.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the second is less than 0 or greater than 59.

    • setDateTime

      public void setDateTime(LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if called. Use the constructor and create a new instance with the updated date and time rather than changing the value of an existing instance.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - the date and time.

    • plusMinusYears

      public DateTimeUtil plusMinusYears(int years)
      Adds or subtracts the specified number of years to this date and time.
      Parameters:
      years - the number of years to add or subtract. If the number is negative, the number of years will be subtracted.
      Returns:
      a new instance of DateTimeUtil with the updated date and time.

    • plusMinusMonths

      public DateTimeUtil plusMinusMonths(int months)
      Adds or subtracts the specified number of months to this date and time.
      Parameters:
      months - the number of months to add or subtract. If the number is negative, the number of months will be subtracted.
      Returns:
      a new instance of DateTimeUtil with the updated date and time.
